page.title: 03MIDDLEMARCH MIDDLE SCHOOL.
page.content: The main part of the school was built in 1956,with a large open plan section being added in the early 1970's. The children are aged between 8 and 12 years,and at present there are 343 on roll.The average size of class is between 30 and 32 pupils.There are four year groups with three classes in each. School begins at 8.55 a.m.There are two fifteen minute breaks,one at 10.30 a.m.,and another at 2.15 p.m.A lunch break begins at 12 noon. A wide variety of subjects is taught, including Maths.,Language,French,Art, Craft,Pottery,History,Geography,Music, P.E.,and Games. School uniform is optional,comprising of a green and yellow tie,white blouse or grey or white shirt,grey jumper or cardigan and grey,navy blue or black skirt or trousers.
